plot: The Earth Star Voyager is a spaceship sent to another solar system to prepare it for colonization. Earth itself is horribly polluted, so the mission is vitally important. But as the departing starship gets under way, signs begin to emerge that their mission may unwittingly be part of a larger conspiracy.   Written by  Ben Hallert

But as the departing starship gets under way, signs begin to emerge that their mission may unwittingly be part of a larger conspiracy.   Written by  Ben Hallert

title: El año de la estrella
